headline.main: Obama Team Makes Early Efforts to Show Willingness to Reach Out to Republicans
headline.print_headline: Obama Team Makes Early Efforts to Show Willingness to Reach Out to Republicans

docs.lead_paragraph: Barack Obama and his advisers are making a visible effort to engage Congressional Republicans, hoping to show they are serious about bipartisanship.

headline.main: Obama Commutes 330 Drug Sentences on Last Day as President
headline.print_headline: Obama Commutes 330 Drug Sentences on Last Day as President

docs.lead_paragraph: In a last major act as president, Barack Obama cut short the sentences of 330 federal inmates convicted of drug crimes on Thursday, bringing his bid to correct what he's called a systematic injustice to a climactic close.
docs.snippet: In a last major act as president, Barack Obama cut short the sentences of 330 federal inmates convicted of drug crimes on Thursday, bringing his bid to correct what he's called a systematic injustice to a climactic close....

headline.main: China Notes Progress in Ties Under US President Obama
headline.print_headline: China Notes Progress in Ties Under US President Obama

docs.lead_paragraph: Sidestepping recent disputes over Taiwan and regional security, China said Thursday that "important progress" has been made in its relationship with the U.S. under President Barack Obama and the two countries should move forward as partners rather than competitors.

headline.main: Obama Gives $500 Million to Climate Fund Over GOP Objections
headline.print_headline: Obama Gives $500 Million to Climate Fund Over GOP Objections

headline.seo: Congressional Oversight Panel Raises Concern for Small Banks
headline.main: Concern Aired Over Banks’ Real Estate Loans
